entry.title: Armeniaโs great challenges and the power of storytelling

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs great challenges and the power of storytelling
media:group.media:description:
On the sidelines of the Armenian Society of Fellows annual conference, Emmy-winning filmmaker Ted Bogosian sat down with CivilNet to discuss the importance of Armenia getting its story and message out to the world. Bogosian explains the challenge of storytelling, messaging and why Armenian issues are close to his heart.

entry.title: Pashinyan calls Putin to discuss humanitarian crisis in Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan calls Putin to discuss humanitarian crisis in Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
๐Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan called Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Nagorno-Karabakh. ๐A spokesperson for Russiaโs Foreign Ministry again called on Azerbaijan to lift its blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh, now approaching its 7th month. ๐Pashinyan said Armenia and Azerbaijan have made โsome progressโ toward a peace deal, but added that substantial differences between the two sides remain. ๐The U.S. ambassador to Armenia said Washington โdoes not presuppose the outcomeโ of Armeniaโs negotiations with Azerbaijan.

media:group.media:description:
Richard Giragosian, the director of the Yerevan-based Regional Studies Center, discusses last weekโs US-mediated talks in Washington between Armenia and Azerbaijan. media:group.media:title: Aliyev and his disingenuous peace
media:group.media:description:
In the latest episode of Insights with Eric Hacopian, Eric discusses the tightening of Azerbaijanโs blockade of Artsakh, and what the Armenian nation and world can do to raise awareness of this existential crisis. Eric also talks about the pitfalls in the Armenian governmentโs approach to both the blockade and the on-going talks with Azerbaijan, and why western nations, too, are not being proactive enough to stop the crisis.

media:group.media:title: ีีฅีญีถีธีฌีธีฃีซีกีฏีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีจ ีดีซีกีตีถ ีฎึีกีฃึีกีพีธึีธึีดีจ ีนีงโค ีฆึีธึีตึ ีฃีธึีฎีกึีกึ ิฑึีฅีฃ ิณึีธึีฃีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ
media:group.media:description:
Businessีดีฅีถึ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีดีกีถ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีธึีด ิณึีธึีฃ ีีกึีกึีตีกีถีจ ีฃีธึีฎีกึีกึ, ISTC ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ, LABZ AI ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ิฑึีฅีฃ ิณึีธึีฃีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึึีธึีด ีง ีกึีฐีฅีฝีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ, ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีฏึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีฎึีกีฃึีฅึีซ, ีกีบีกีฃีกีตีซ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ึ ีดีกึีฆีฅึีซ ีกีบีกีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ ิณึีธึีฃีตีกีถีจ ีขีกึีกีฟึีธึีด ีง, ีฉีฅ ีธึึีกีถีธีพ ีง ีกึีคีกึีกึีพีกีฎ ีพีกีญีจ, ีธึ ีกึีฐีฅีฝีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏึีธีญีกึีซีถีซ ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึึ
